name: places/ChIJ9ScD72VZwokRHvr3qQBBrBI
adrFormatAddress: 541 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10016, USA

editorialSummary.text: Store offering shipping, packaging, printing & other services, plus office supplies.

originalText.text:
[(overall review)] This UPS Store is pretty small and is always packed with the line going out the door. But the representatives I met in this store have always been prompt, courteous, and patient even with the worst customers. So here's a shout out to all the representatives in this store: I APPRECIATE YOU!! THANK YOU!

[(Review of December 2023)] AVOID THIS LOCATION IF YOU CAN DURING HOLIDAY SEASON. It's so busy!! Also make note of the strict LIMIT of 5 Amazon returns per customer per day at this UPS Store. The other UPS stores few blocks away do not have this limit.

Not complaining about this restriction at this store though. This an understandable and welcome restriction during the holiday season since there are so many people here! But I do wish they had put up a sign about it online or on the window of the store, so the reps wouldn't need to explain it to every. dang. customers. with Amazon returns.

originalText.text: The girl working there is simply the worst. She’s so rude and unprofessional. She made so many mistakes typing the address and phone number. When I reviewed it on the screen and asked her to change it, guess what? she denied any of the mistakes…like excuse me??? Never had an experience like this. She also tried to overcharged me after. I was sending an express international document in the UPS paper mailer. They quoted me $260 and $160 with no other cheaper options. But when I checked on UPS website, the fastest and most expensive one is $160, there was no $260 option. I mentioned the price difference and showed them the UPS website price and again, they denied it…. I ended up asking for a refund. Please, avoid this place at all cost.

originalText.text: loved everything about this store, from their cleanliness to their excellent customer service! The employees are very professional and extremely polite. I made a notary appointment, in which they called to inform me before hand when their notary services are available, which is great communication on their part. Don't be scared away by the people who complain about their notaries appt, they're just entitled people because they do call in advance! In my opinion this is the best UPS store I've been to! AMAZING EMPLOYEES.

originalText.text: I would leave a 0 star review if I could. This is one of the few UPS listed as having a notary service. We booked an appointment a week ahead, received a confirmation, came with all of our things, and was told in the coldest manner possible that they did not offer this service. There was a mistake in the hours listed which they clearly knew about already, they didn't bother to correct it, and they made no effort to contact us in a whole week since we got the confirmation. And not even an apology for wasting our time, just a cold shrug. Will never trust this place again.

And not even an apology for wasting our time, just a cold shrug. Will never trust this place again.

originalText.text: Employees are well trained and professional, they helped me out  in a quick and efficient matter. extremely impressed on how clean and organized the store is, very welcoming customer service too! the "bad" reviews just give "entitle people", but makes sense due to the neighborhood, but overall my experience was excellent, as well as many others that came in while I was there, the employees give the same professionalism and kindness to all that come in!
